mdata.xhtml:
The iQ2 brings you all the features of the iQ and even more:

Smart Entry and Start system
Automatic air conditioning
Chrome rear light clusters
15" high gloss alloy wheels
Front fog lamps
Rain sensing wipers
Dusk sensing headlamps
Heated retractable door mirrors

mdata.expanded: True style is in the detail . The rear chrome garnish and eye-catching chrome side sills add subtle touches of flair, further enhancing the iQ's distinctive appeal. Brushed aluminium scuff plates complete the urban sophistication.

Add extra convenience to your iQ with the full map, touch screen navigation system. Complete with Bluetooth, music streaming, full iPod integration, USB connection and fixed speed camera notification.

mdata.xhtml:
Radically different
Practicality, performance and pure driving pleasure in a compact package

Less than 3 metres long
Highly individual, robust styling
Low CO2 emissions, starting at just 99g/km
Incredible interior space
Nine airbags
ABS with Brake Assist and EBD
50/50 split rear seats
Manual air conditioning
15" alloy wheels
Six-speaker audio system
